revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Victory Road Hoenn |image = [[File:Victory Road Hoenn.png|250px]] |caption = A bird's-eye view of Victory Road Hoenn. |tokens = 37,000 |location = North of Ever Grande City. }} '''Victory Road Hoenn''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 560,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:2-->

<tab name="Debuff"> <!--T:9-->
<!--T:10--> After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items in Hoenn will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
